title: Replay?
body:
Is there any way to view my past game?. (like in game on spectator mode, NOT the score and items only.)

thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

There is currently no replay system in-game for now, however there are many sites that offer ways to obtain your replays.

The one I currently recommend is http://www.replay.gg/ as it requires no installation of third party software to use.
